feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Migrate / add some more automation tests by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15086

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.18...3.2.19

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • API typing - app service A -> D by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15100
  • Fix MySQL options column imports that have commas or other type names in them. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15106

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.19...3.2.20

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.22
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove unused types by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15108
  • adding buffer settings for single image by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15111

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.21...3.2.22

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.23
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • prevent empty snippets being saved, don't crash for old empty snippets by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15114

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.22...3.2.23
